pyDiamondsBackground.models package¶

Submodules¶

pyDiamondsBackground.models.BackgroundModel module¶

class pyDiamondsBackground.models.BackgroundModel.BackgroundModel(covariates: numpy.ndarray, dimension: int, name: str, fileAppendix: str = '')[source]¶

Bases: pyDiamonds.Model

The Background model is an abstract class, that provides the necessary methods to compute a bayesian analysis with PyDIAMONDS. It inherits multiple methods already from the Model class from PyDIAMONDS, naming the predict method and it provides said Models class with the covariates, the frequential axis of the data.

dimension¶

Property for the dimensions of the priors :return: Size of Priors :rtype: int

fileAppendix¶

Property for the fileAppendix. Used in Background. :return: Text for the fileAppendix :rtype: str

getNyquistFrequency()[source]¶
Returns:The Nyquist frequency. Must have been set previously using the setter property.
Return type:float
getResponseFunction()[source]¶
Returns:The response function. Multiplied with the prediction to create an initial sampling
Return type:ndarray
name¶

Property for the name of the model :return: Name of the model :rtype: str

nyquistFrequency¶

Property of the Nyquist frequency. Raises a ValueError if the Nyquist frequency was not set previously. :return: The Nyquist frequency :rtype: float

predict(predictions: numpy.ndarray, modelParameters: numpy.ndarray)[source]¶

Predict method, called by PyDIAMONDS to sample an initial value set. Must be implemented in the class derived from this class. Here one can calculate the model using the modelParameters as an input from DIAMONDS. Must return the predictions after finishing the calculation. :param predictions: The predictions for the dataset :type predictions: ndarray :param modelParameters: The parameters for the model, representing the priors. Determined by PyDIAMONDS :type modelParameters: ndarray :return: The predictions for the dataset using the covariates. :rtype: ndarray

readNyquistFrequencyFromFile(fileName: str)[source]¶

Reads the Nyquist frequency from a file and sets it as the used Nyquist frequency :type fileName: str :param: fileName: Name of the file containing the nyquist frequency. Must contain only one item! :type: fileName: str

pyDiamondsBackground.models.FullBackgroundModel module¶

class pyDiamondsBackground.models.FullBackgroundModel.FullBackgroundModel(covariates: numpy.ndarray)[source]¶

Bases: pyDiamondsBackground.models.BackgroundModel.BackgroundModel

This class implements a full background model, including colored noise components. It therefore needs 12 priors to compute them properly. See documentation for BackgroundModel for further documentation.

predict(predictions: numpy.ndarray, modelParameters: numpy.ndarray)[source]¶

The predict implementation of this model implements the background of a solar like oscillator including the colored noise component of the dataset. :param predictions: The predictions for the sampling of the initial dataset :type predictions: ndarray :param modelParameters: The model parameters used to compute the initial sampling of the dataset, basically representing the priors. :return: The predictions of the dataset :type modelParameters: ndarray

pyDiamondsBackground.models.WhiteNoiseOnlyModel module¶

class pyDiamondsBackground.models.WhiteNoiseOnlyModel.WhiteNoiseOnlyModel(covariates)[source]¶

Bases: pyDiamondsBackground.models.BackgroundModel.BackgroundModel

This implementation of the Backgroundmodel implements a purely white noise only model, containing only the granulation components as well as the white noise.

predict(predictions, modelParameters)[source]¶

The predict method for this implementation computes a white noise only model for the dataset :param predictions: The predictions for the sampling of the initial dataset :type predictions: ndarray :param modelParameters: The model parameters used to compute the initial sampling of the dataset, basically representing the priors. :return: The predictions of the dataset :type modelParameters: ndarray

pyDiamondsBackground.models.WhiteNoiseOscillationModel module¶

class pyDiamondsBackground.models.WhiteNoiseOscillationModel.WhiteNoiseOscillationModel(covariates)[source]¶

Bases: pyDiamondsBackground.models.BackgroundModel.BackgroundModel

This implementation of the Background model implements a solar like oscillator including granular components as well as the white noise component.

predict(predictions, modelParameters)[source]¶

The predict method for this implementation computes a model for a solar like oscillator with white background noise. :param predictions: The predictions for the sampling of the initial dataset :type predictions: ndarray :param modelParameters: The model parameters used to compute the initial sampling of the dataset, basically representing the priors. :return: The predictions of the dataset :type modelParameters: ndarray
